title: Virtual Architect Home & Landscape Platinum Suite
description: Take a fresh approach to the way you live with virtual Architect home & Landscape Platinum suite 8.0. This innovation in home design software delivers the powerful tools and inspiration you need to transform your living space, plus expert help to get the job done right. With virtual Architect home & Landscape Platinum suite 8.0, you can plan room additions and other home improvement projects with ease, make your home energy efficient with new lighting and appliances, breathe new life into an outdated kitchen, bathroom or bedroom and so much more. You can even design your dream home. No design experience necessary - with our wizard-driven interface, all you have to do is point and click!.
